mapper.select:
SELECT da.status AS status, d.vehicle_id AS vehicleId, v.type AS vehicleType, v.allocation AS allocation, d.outbound_id AS outboundId, d.created_at AS createdAt
FROM Dispatch d LEFT JOIN DispatchApproval da ON da.dispatch_id = d.id LEFT JOIN Vehicle v ON d.vehicle_id = v.id WHERE da.id IS NOT NULL AND d.id = #{id} -- ORDER BY d.allocation DESC -- LIMIT 5
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Dispatch (outbound_id, vehicle_id, remark, created_at) VALUES (#{outboundId}, #{vehicleId}, #{remark}, #{createdAt});
